Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the poll case remains pending before the Philippine Supreme Court as of January 15, 2021.
Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that Bongbong Marcos has won his poll case in January 2021, when there is no decision yet on the case.
Lack enough support: The misleading video contains clips taken from unrelated reports that do not support the claim that Duterte announced Marcos won his poll case in 2021.
Exist alternative explanation: The clips in the misleading video are from unrelated sources and events, suggesting that there is an alternative explanation for the claim.
